item.description: Biography Adrien Gruson is a post-doc researcher at McGill University under the supervision of Prof. Nowrouzezahrai. Previously he was a post-doc at the University of Tokyo with Prof. Toshiya Hachisuka and was a member of Japanese French Laboratory of Informatics (JFLI). His research interests include physically-based rendering based on MCMC or gradient-domain approaches.

item.title: News
item.description: Apr/1/2019: I have joined McGill as a postdoctoral researcher under the supervision of Prof. Nowrouzezahrai. Nov/20/2018: We have uploaded the website for our upcomming SIGGRAPH Asia course. July/31/2018: Additional materials (code and scenes) of GVPM have been released. May/15/2018: Siggraph paper uploaded! The code and additional materials will be released soon.
